question: Many market linked insurance products & mutual funds available in the market provide the consumers, a guarantee of return on the basis of Highest NAV known as Net Asset Value. The net asset value is a measure of ?
option2: Value of a particular share at a time
option3: Value of a assets less the value of liabilities.
option4: Value of a share in respect with the other shares
answer: Value of a assets less the value of liabilities.
